project.name: Photo frame
project.description: Photo frame Android app demonstrates Kaa event subsystem capabilities
project.details:
This simple app demonstrates Kaa event subsystem capabilities on Android platform.

Installation

Download the .apk to your Android device by clicking the "Binary" button on the left. Make sure that the device permits installing apps from "Unknown sources". Open the downloaded apk and follow the on-screen instructions.

Playing around

Make sure that the Kaa sandbox is up and running. You will need to install this application on two devices at least and login with same user name. Any password will be accepted since trustful user verifier is used for demonstration purposes.

Each endpoint scans its photo library and sends metadata about the albums to other endpoints using Kaa events subsystem. Every endpoint can select one of the photo albums in order to triger slideshow on the target endpoint.

Please note that all features of Administrative UI are also supported by REST API.

What's next?

Get the source code by clicking the "Source" button on the left and start hacking!

For more background on Kaa Event subsystem please refer to the corresponding programming guide and design reference sections.
